Worst game ever, I'm sorry I bought this garbage game, all competitive matches are with guys without brain and with a lot of hackers, so just be careful if you want to buy the Prime.

DO NOT EVER DOWNLOAD THIS GAME

I have lost over 1400 hours of my life playing a game I don't even like, this is a cry for help. I can't stop playing this stupid game, my dad was an alcoholic and even he had an easier time quitting. The community is garbage, non-prime is a goddamn joke (cheaters everywhere) and skins are a bottomless pit of financial ruin. This must be what Stockholm syndrome feels like. 

Overall 10/10
